definitions: using physical force intended to hurt, damage, or kill someone or something

examples.text: I was once violently assaulted on a bus
protesters clashed violently with the police

shortDefinitions: using physical force intended to hurt, damage, or kill person or thing

definitions: in a very strong or vigorous manner
shortDefinitions: in very strong or vigorous manner

definitions: to a very great degree; intensely

examples.text: I found myself violently disagreeing with him
he woke up feeling violently ill
